Set Intermediate Bells Done Please set the desired number of intermediate bells. The value should be smaller than the duration of the session.

Too Many Intermediate Bells The number of intermediate bells should be smaller than the overall duration of the session. Ok, I will change it.
How are you? How are you feeling today? Keeping track of mood improves self-regulation. Submit Skip

dd/MM/YYYY Mindful Sessions Daily Check-in Not Set
Daily Check-In Done Keeping track of mood improves self-regulation.
Well Done! You have successfully completed your mindfulness session. Congratulations! How did it go? We appreciate it\'s not always easy to maintain a mindful attitude during a session.\n\nHowever, rest assured that feeling distracted and losing focus is quite common. So don\'t worry, this is part of the process! Ok. Great!
Not set
Meditation Reminders Enable Reminders per day Reminder 1 Reminder 2 Reminder 3 Reminder 4 Reminder 5
Mindful Moments Reminders Reminders per day Enable
Meditation Reminders Done Please choose how many reminders you would like to receive per day to practice mindfulness meditation.
Mindful Moments Reminders Done Please choose how many notifications you would like to receive throughout the day to help you stay mindful.
Set Reminder Time Done Please pick a time for the meditation reminder.
Time to meditate! Hey there, it’s time for our mindfulness practice! \ud83d\ude04
Experiencing the present The little things? The little moments? They aren’t little. \ud83d\ude04
Cultivating mindfulness The best way to capture moments is to pay attention. This is how we cultivate mindfulness. \ud83d\ude04
Be mindful of the present The present moment is the only time over which we have dominion.
Live the moment Live the actual moment. Only this actual moment is life. \ud83d\ude04
The power of acceptance What would it be like if I could accept life – accept this moment – exactly as it is?
Focus on what you are doing now Do not dwell in the past or in the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
Experience every moment as it happens Wherever you are, be there totally. \ud83d\ude04
Nothing but the present Realize deeply that the present moment is all you have.
Let go of your worries Worrying is stupid, it’s like walking around with an umbrella waiting for it to rain.
Just breathe In a world full of doing, doing, doing, it’s important to take a moment to just breathe, to just be
